Uses of Class
de.ailis.usb4java.libusb.DeviceHandle

  • Packages that use DeviceHandle 
    Package Description
    de.ailis.usb4java.libusb
    Low-Level classes based on the native libusb library.

    • Uses of DeviceHandle in de.ailis.usb4java.libusb

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeviceHandle Transfer.getDevHandle()
      Returns the handle of the device that this transfer will be submitted to.
      static DeviceHandle LibUsb.openDeviceWithVidPid(Context context, int vendorId, int productId)
      Convenience function for finding a device with a particular idVendor/idProduct combination.
